title: Amazon Brand - Presto! Flex-a-Size Paper Towels, 158 Sheet Huge Roll, 12 Rolls (2 Packs of 6), Equivalent to 38 Regular Rolls, White
descriptions:
**Product Listing:**

Introducing the Amazon Brand - Presto! Flex-a-Size Paper Towels, the perfect addition to your household cleaning supplies. These paper towels are designed to provide convenience, durability, and superior absorbency for all your cleaning needs.

- Product Name: Amazon Brand - Presto! Flex-a-Size Paper Towels
- Quantity: 12 rolls
- Roll Type: Huge Roll
- Sheet Count per Roll: 158
- Sheet Size: 2-ply
- Flex-a-Size: Yes

With a total of 12 rolls, each containing 158 sheets, these paper towels will last you a long time. The 2-ply design ensures strength and durability, allowing you to tackle even the toughest messes. 

The Flex-a-Size feature allows you to choose the perfect sheet size for any task. Whether it's a small spill or a big mess, you can easily tear off the right amount of paper towel to get the job done efficiently.

In addition, these paper towels are up to 75% more absorbent compared to the leading 1-ply brand, ensuring that you can clean up spills quickly and effectively. The absorbency of these paper towels is equivalent to 38 regular rolls, making them a cost-effective choice for your household.

The white color adds a touch of cleanliness to your space, and the brand recommendation comparison to Bounty Paper Towels ensures you're getting a high-quality product.

Choose the Amazon Brand - Presto! Flex-a-Size Paper Towels for all your cleaning needs and experience the convenience and efficiency they offer.

Product Listing:

Introducing the Amazon Brand - Presto! Flex-a-Size Paper Towels, a versatile and highly absorbent solution for all your cleaning needs. With a pack of 12 rolls, each containing 158 sheets, these paper towels are designed to provide convenience and efficiency.

The rolls are classified as Huge Rolls, offering a generous sheet count per roll. With 2-ply thickness, these towels provide exceptional strength and durability. Each sheet is designed to be flex-a-size, allowing you to choose the perfect size for any task. The white color adds a touch of elegance to your cleaning routine.

Compared to leading 1-ply brands, these Presto! Flex-a-Size Paper Towels offer up to 75% more absorbency. This means you can tackle spills and messes with ease, knowing that these towels will quickly soak up liquids and leave surfaces clean and dry. 

With the equivalent of 38 regular rolls, this pack provides long-lasting value. The absorbency and quality of these paper towels make them a reliable choice for any household or commercial setting. 

In addition, Amazon Brand - Presto! Flex-a-Size Paper Towels are recommended by the brand itself and compared to the well-known Bounty Paper Towels. This endorsement speaks to the quality and performance of these paper towels, making them a trusted option for all your cleaning needs.

Choose the Amazon Brand - Presto! Flex-a-Size Paper Towels for superior absorbency, convenience, and durability. Experience the difference today and revolutionize your cleaning routine.
